metadata.name: Mafia #0001
metadata.description: The Eight Bit Mafia are a collection of 8,888 unique mobster NFTs living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Eight Bit Mafia mobster grants access to members-only benefits, the first of which is access to the Mafia Sharktank, allowing you to pitch your NFT project ideas, and vote for other projects via our members only portal. Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activation. Visit www.eightbitmafia.com for more details
